attributes.action: use the current economic climate to start a social housing program.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
o  There is a massive housing shortage.
o  The private housing market has all but stopped.
o  Private house building has stopped.
o  There is a great many builders out of work.

The government should use this opportunity to start a building program for a large number of social housing programs that are required in all areas of the country.

This will address the housing shortage, reduce cost for unemployment and give many people a valuable job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
